name: Health Hazard
description:
Avoid the red balls, get the yellow ball I guess, if you want more health. But the more health you have, the more hazardous things get. Hmm. Quite the dilemma.

"Help, my health bars aren't loading! Or the game is kinda laggy/won't load!"

If you have Windows, download the Windows .zip below. The experience is a lot smoother, trust me.
